node.full_text: Interesting thought. In a general perspective it's a risk to upgrade all the app to a major version in early releases, However, if we don't, we got stucked in old version. Now, #microfrontends dont sound such crazy as the last year for gradual upgrading right? https://t.co/3VT0CVtxVj

Do I need to use multiple UI frameworks when I implement a #microfrontends #architecture?

Trust me, the benefits outweigh the trade offs by a mile! ü•á
